content: I think I'll give "The Haunting of Hill House" a shot. I've been in the mood for a horror series lately, and it sounds like it's more focused on storytelling than just jump scares. I'll try to fit it in around my other watches, maybe watch an episode or two a week. Thanks for the suggestion! What do you think about "The OA"? Is it similar to "Stranger Things" in terms of its sci-fi elements?
